mapper.select: select r.* from COM_BRIEF_REVIEW r left join SYS_USER u on u.USER_ID = r.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE=0 where r.REVIEW_ID=#{id} and r.IS_DELETE=0
mapper.insert: insert into COM_BRIEF_REVIEW(review_time, REVIEW_BODY, user_id, rela_type, rela_id) values (now(),#{body.textId},#{user.id},#{relaType},#{relaId})
mapper.update: update COM_BRIEF_REVIEW set IS_DELETE=1, IS_DELETE_TIME=now() where REVIEW_ID=#{id}
update COM_BRIEF_REVIEW set REVIEW_TIME=now(), RELA_TYPE=#{relaType}, RELA_ID=#{relaId} where REVIEW_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select REVIEW_ID from COM_BRIEF_REVIEW where REVIEW_ID=#{id} and IS_DELETE=0
